name: ROMBOONEH - PART BUN:PART BNNU
description:
Blast your way through the horde of ghosts and goops and go for the high score!

HOW TO PLAY

W,A,S,D  - Movement

Arrow Keys - Shoot Bun Gun in desired direction.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This  was made in a 3-5 hour game jam and is considered very much an alpha prototype.

Game Design & Code By: StormBreakerPirate

Character and Cover Art By: RaweniArt

Level Art By: CaseAhDia

Logo By: JokoBeast
